emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Urban Planning
emerging_technologies.description: An AI system that optimizes urban planning for sustainability, traffic flow, and resource management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to more efficient cities but might raise concerns about privacy and decision-making autonomy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires regulatory acceptance, investment in smart city infrastructure, and public trust in AI decision-making.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Communication Networks
emerging_technologies.description: Secure communication networks leveraging quantum entanglement for unbreakable encryption.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances digital security but requires significant infrastructure overhaul and could be exploited for surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial cost, need for quantum-resistant cryptography, and international cooperation for standards.

emerging_technologies.name: Cognitive Augmentation via Neural Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Neural interfaces that enhance cognitive functions, offering memory storage, real-time learning, and decision-making support.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises ethical concerns about equity, privacy, and the nature of human intelligence.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires overcoming biological and ethical barriers, regulatory approval, and public acceptance.

emerging_technologies.name: Lunar Resource Extraction
emerging_technologies.description: Robotic systems for mining lunar resources, enabling in-situ resource utilization for lunar bases and Earth supply.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Facilitates space colonization but could lead to geopolitical tensions over lunar resource rights.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Depends on space travel advancements, cost-effectiveness, and international space law.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Assisted Software Development
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools that automate parts of software development, from coding to testing.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, transforming software development practices.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Electric Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Electric vehicles with full self-driving capabilities, reducing human error and increasing safety.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming the norm in urban areas, with regulatory frameworks adapting to support their integration.

epoch_themes.description: AI permeates all sectors, driving automation and decision-making.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased efficiency and productivity, with potential job displacement and ethical concerns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global race for AI supremacy, shaping economic and geopolitical strategies.

epoch_themes.description: Humanity's push to explore and settle beyond Earth.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: New frontiers for human expansion and resource acquisition, possibly leading to space-based economies.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased collaboration and competition in space exploration, with focus on lunar and Mars missions.
